New Records: Youri Tielemans scored the fastest goal in 73 seconds, setting a new record for the quickest goal in Euro 2024
Key Match Events: Belgium secured a 2-0 win over Romania with goals from Youri Tielemans and Kevin De Bruyne
The match was characterized by high-energy attacks from Belgium and strong defensive performances from Romania
Pre-Game Insights: Belgium manager Domenico Tedesco emphasized the importance of the result and praised the team's performance
Romania's coach Edward Iordanescu highlighted the complexity of the group and the need for unity
Post-Match Reflections: Belgium's players expressed relief and satisfaction with the result, while Romania's coach acknowledged the difficulty of the group stage
Domenico Tedesco reflected on the team's preparation and strategy
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in an incredible atmosphere with 42,535 fans in attendance
The result set up a crucial final round showdown with all four teams in Group E on equal points
Others: The game was broadcast on FOX and live updates were available on ESPN's digital platforms
